name: Renal Cortex
short_description: The outer layer of the kidney containing nephrons.

name: Renal Medulla
short_description: The inner portion of the kidney containing renal pyramids.

name: Renal Pyramids
short_description: Cone-shaped tissues within the medulla that contain collecting ducts.

name: Renal Artery
short_description: The blood vessel that carries oxygenated blood to the kidney.

name: Renal Vein
short_description: The blood vessel that carries deoxygenated blood away from the kidney.

name: Renal Pelvis
short_description: Funnel-shaped structure that collects urine from the kidney.

name: Ureter
short_description: The tube that carries urine from the kidney to the bladder.
